text: Akave, (napiye!) Anku nir tolukaikkaka orukkalum nirka ventam - niccayamaka arampa tinattileye payapaktiyin mitu atikolappatta masjitu ullatu atil nir ninru (tolavum, tola vaikkavum) mikavum takutiyanatu ankirukkum manitarkal tuymaiyutaiyoraka iruppataiye virumpukirarkal. Allah tuymaiyutaiyoraiye virumpukiran
